name: Crazy Shake (Alpha v.1)
description:
Crazy Shake is a 3D first person adventure game. This game was created in a Game Jam (from 11th to 13th May, we had 40h to do it, and some hours were spent sleeping a bit), so at the moment is in active development because we dind't had enough time to finish it correctly but the main idea is done.

The objective of the game is to collect the 5 types of fruit. Every fruit is located in a different room. There you will find different enemies. You can kill them with your insecticide.

When you collect a fruit, you have to put it in the mixer but be careful, when you carry a fruit, you can't jump. You can't carry two fruits at the same time.

You have 3 lives, and if you loose them, the game will finish. If you loose a live and you were carrying a fruit, you will loose it and you will have to pick it again.

Letter "P" is for display de pause menu. You only can save the game near the mixer in the "safe zone". Anyway, in the game you will find a wall with the instructions.

Native (and recommended) game resolution is 1024 x 768.

If you have any question or idea please tell me in the comments section. We will work on it as soon as possible.

Thank you and have fun!

STAY TUNED FOR UPDATES!!!

-Best regards, Sonikka :)

All the music is from https://freesound.org/

This game is made by:

Sonia Prieto (Programmer) 

Carlos Fernandez (Programmer) 

Javier Fernandez (Art/3D Modeling) 

Samuel Baltasar (Art/3D Modeling) 

Luis Martinez (Art/3D Modeling)

Versions:

15/05/2018 Alpha v.1
